|InstructionDef.text=Welcome to RimWorld! This tutorial will teach you how to play the game.<br/><br/>The first step is to generate a world to play in.<br/><br/>This page configures how your world should be generated.<br/><br/>The default settings here are good - go ahead and click GENERATE!
